No games found description 1: Your game missing? If the game is new there's a chance Thunderstore have yet to add it. If you can find it on
No games found description 2: but not here, please message us on
No games found description 3: or open an issue on our
Export as code complete: Export complete! The code has been copied to your clipboard.
Import profile override description: Are you sure you want to override '%name%'?
Import from R2 description 1: This will import cached mods and profiles for the current game from r2modman or Thunderstore Mod Manager.
Import from R2 description 2: The process may take a couple of minutes, depending on how many mods and profiles there are to import. Profiles with the same name will be overwritten!
Import from R2 description 3: Please do not close Gale while the import is in progress.
Delete profile description: Are you sure you want to delete %name%?
Launch game description: If the game is taking a while to start, it's probably because Steam is starting up.
Import mod directory description: Select the directory containing the mod package
Import mod file description: Select the mod file to import
Export file description: Select the directory to export the profile to
Duplicate active profile description: Enter a name for the duplicated profile:
Rename active profile description: Enter a new name for the profile:
Duplicate active profile processing: This process might take up to a minute depending on the size of the profile, please be patient.
Create new profile description: Enter a name for the new profile:
Update installed description: Gale will now restart in order to apply the update.
App update available description 1: Version %newVersion% of Gale is available - you have %currentVersion%.
App update available description 2: There is an update available for Gale.
App update available description 3: The update will be downloaded and installed in the background, and then the app will restart to apply the changes.
App update available description 4: Would you like to install it?
Welcome to Gale description 1: To get started, select a game to mod:
Welcome to Gale description 2: You can choose automatically transfer profiles from %importText% to Gale.
Welcome to Gale description 3: The process may take a couple of minutes, depending on how many mods and profiles there are to import. It will also transfer configs and cached mods.
Welcome to Gale description 4: You can always import profiles later by going to Import > ...from r2modman.
Welcome to Gale description 5: Lastly, make sure your settings are correct.
Welcome to Gale description 6: You can always edit these later by going to
Welcome to Gale description 8: That's it, you're all set up to start modding!
Welcome to Gale description 9: If you have any questions or need help, feel free to ask in the
Abort installation description: Are you sure you want to abort the installation?
Set thunderstore token description 1: Enter your Thunderstore API token below, or leave blank to clear the current one. This token is used to publish modpacks to Thunderstore, and will be stored securely on your computer.
Set thunderstore token description 2: Once set, you will not be able to view the token again.
Unsure thunderstore token: Unsure how to get your API token?
Unsure thunderstore token description 5: 3. If you don't have one already, create a new team. The name should be your own username.
Unsure thunderstore token description 6: 4. Select a team and go to Service Accounts on the left sidebar.
Unsure thunderstore token description 7: 5. Click Add service account and choose an appropriate nickname, for example "gale".
Unsure thunderstore token description 8: 6. Once you submit, the API token will be displayed. Make sure you copy and paste it here, since you won't be able to see it once you navigate away from the page.
Unsure thunderstore token description 9: Do not share the token with anyone else, as it gives power to update, publish or delete packages in your name!
Thunderstore token description: Thunderstore API token to use for modpack publishing. Once this is set, you will not be able to view the token again.
Launch mode description: Determines how the game is launched.
Launch mode description steam: Steam: Launches through Steam, which slower than directly. However, some games require Steam to be running, including Lethal Company.
Launch mode description direct: Direct: Launches the game directly from the executable. Also allows you to launch multiple instances at once.
Number of instances description: How many instances of the game to launch at once. Only available in direct mode.
Interval between launches description: How many seconds to wait between launching each instance. Only applicable in direct mode with multiple instances.
Zoom factor description: Changes the zoom level of the mod manager.
Config unsupported format: This file is in an unsupported format. Please open it in an external program to make changes.
Error reading config file: An error occured while reading this config file:
Select config file editing: Select a config file to start editing
Modepack name description: The name of the modpack, as shown on Thunderstore. Make sure this stays consistent between updates. Cannot contain spaces or hyphens.
Modepack author description: The author of the modpack, which should be the name of your Thunderstore team.
Modepack description description: A short description of the modpack.
Modepack categories description: The categories that the modpack belongs to. 'Modpacks' is always included.
Modepack version description: The version number of the modpack, in the format of X.Y.Z. You cannot publish with the same version number twice.
Modepack websiter description: The URL of a website of your choosing. Optional.
Modepack icon description: Path to the icon of the modpack. This is automatically resized to 256x256 pixels, so it's recommended to be a square image to avoid stretching or squishing.
Modepack readme description: A longer description of the modpack, which supports markdown formatting (similarly to Discord messages).
Modepack changelog description: A list of changes in the modpack, also supports markdown formatting. Leave empty to omit.
Modepack include description: Choose which config files to include in the modpack.
Modpack upload complete description 1: %name% %versionNumber% has successfully been published on Thunderstore!
Modpack upload complete description 2: Click here to view its page on the website
Modpack upload complete description 4: The changes may take up to an hour to appear in Gale and other mod managers.
Modpack upload complete description 5: To publish a new update, increment the version number and publish the modpack again.
Missing dependencies description: Some of %name%'s dependencies could not be found:
Steam library description: Path to the Steam game library. This should contain the 'steamapps' directory.
Gale data directory description: Directory where mods and profiles are stored
Gale cache directory description: Directory where cached mods are stored. This can take up a considerable amount of space.
Dir Change will move: Changing this will move the existing data.
Override game directory description: Path to the %name% game directory. Leave empty to use the default Steam library.
Use download cache description:
Whether to cache downloaded mods. This speeds up install times and lowers bandwidth usage, but can take a considerable amount of disk space.
Warning: Disabling this will delete the existing cache.
Fetch mods automatically description:
Whether to automatically start fetching mods when a game is selected and every 15 minutes thereafter. This will ensure the mod list is up-to-date, but can be disabled to save bandwidth.
To manually trigger a fetch, go to File > Fetch mods.
Following mod not found: The following mod could not be found:
Following mods not found: The following mods could not be found:
Ignore in update all: Ignore this update in the 'Update all' list.
Confirm uninstallation description: The following mods depend on %s and will likely not work if it is uninstalled!
Confirm disabling description: The following mods depend on %s and will likely not work if it is disabled!
Confirm enabling description: %s depends on the following disabled mods, and will likely not work if any of them are disabled!
Language description: Changes the language of the mod manager.
Immediate reboot description: Reboot immediately to apply the language change
Name: Name
Author: Author
